DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of two asthma treatments by lung function measures.

DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate, Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Currently receiving 200800mcg/day beclomethasone dipropionate. sRAW value of 1.3 kPa's. 3 or more courses of oral steroids in last 12 months.
